description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Speaker Name - Co-founder and SVP of Global Network Strategy at Tradeshift

ABSTRACT
I will talk about how connecting businesses in social technology based networks globally may have the power to fundamentally disrupt the way that supply chains, finance and the relationships between companies works. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7763

https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com
title: Everything Floats - A look into the Chinese mirror
